info.abstract: The Text Converter component converts various types of text file to other text file types.
info.description: This component allows you to convert text file from one type to another. Currently you can use this component to convert a XML file to a tab-delimited text file.

ul.li: A text file to be converted.

info.outputs:
.
Text file converted to a new format.

ul.li: Input file type, currently only XML is accepted
Output file type, currently tab-delimited is available
